ns0:DescribedValueSet.displayName: Activation of Emergency Medical System Education

ns0:Concept.displayName: Activation of emergency medical services education (procedure)

ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent procedures used to represent patients who receive emergency medical system education.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Communication. The intent of this data element is to identify patients who receive education on the activation of emergency medical system. ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with only SNOMED CT codes representing emergency medical system education.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
